sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams, useLocation, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderScreen() { const params = useParams() const location = useLocation() const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const {sdkReady, setSdkReady} = useState(false) const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const {order, error, loading} = orderDetails const orderId = params.id const orderPay = useSelector(state => state.orderPay) const {loading: loadingPay, success: successPay} = orderPay console.log(orderDetails) if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } // AfDfCSwyknkISelFENVmSEHx5HM7UHGKIqfrr4hEjcoLmclycDQPRr19uurYOvqRyhqlSRy_1_RalIUT const addPayPalScript = () => { const script = document.createElement('script') script.type = 'text/javascript' script.src = 'https://www.paypal.com/sdk/js?client-id=AfDfCSwyknkISelFENVmSEHx5HM7UHGKIqfrr4hEjcoLmclycDQPRr19uurYOvqRyhqlSRy_1_RalIUT' script.async = true script.onload = () => { setSdkReady(true) } document.body.appendChild(script) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)){ console.log('details') dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [order, orderId, dispatch]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order: {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ) : ( Not Delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Item: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice} {error && {error}}
) } export default OrderScreen
